messages.title: A PAY RISE FOR HARDWORKING BRITAIN WITH LABOUR
messages.content: Labour will make the minimum wage over £8 an hour for a full-time worker on the minimum wage.

messages.title: LABOUR WILL CUT THE DEFICIT EVERY YEAR
messages.content: Labour sets out a plan to build a strong economic foundation and balance the books.

messages.title: A&E FACING WORST CRISIS ON RECORD AS TORY-LIB DEM CRISIS STARTS TO BITE
messages.content: NHS statistics show A&E departments are facing the worst crisis on record, with more than a million people waiting over four hours.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase the minimum wage to over £8 an hour for full-time workers.
Labour will cut the deficit every year with a balanced plan to build a strong economy.
Address the A&E crisis and reverse healthcare privatization.
Reduce tuition fees from £9,000 to £6,000 and increase apprentice opportunities.
Tackle the Tory-Lib Dem cost-of-living crisis.

issues.economy: Labour sets out a plan to build a strong economic foundation and balance the books. Labour will also reverse the Tory-Lib Dem tax cuts for millionaires and crack the whip on tax avoiders.
issues.education: Tuition fees cut from £9,000 to £6,000 and more apprenticeships for the next generation.
issues.health: A&E departments are facing the worst crisis on record, with more than a million people waiting over four hours. Labour will invest in the NHS.

quotes.text: Nick Clegg’s record of broken promises is coming back to haunt the Lib Dems as support collapses.

images.caption: NHS crisis imagery and Labour campaigners
Individual believed to be Nick Clegg with disappointment expression
